tool_description: Analyzes delivery timelines by comparing actual tracking events against expected delivery schedules and service level agreements.

tracking_events.description: Array of tracking event descriptions with timestamps

service_level.description: Shipping service level (standard, express, overnight, etc.)

destination_zone.description: Delivery destination zone for transit time calculation

error_messages: Invalid date format: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Ship date after expected delivery: Ship date cannot be later than expected delivery date.
Empty tracking events: At least one tracking event must be provided.
Invalid service level: Service level must be one of: standard, express, overnight, same-day.
Timeline inconsistency: Tracking events contain timestamp inconsistencies.
usage: Provide tracking_events, ship_date, expected_delivery, and service_level to analyze delivery performance against expectations.

days_in_transit.description: Total days package has been in transit

delay_hours.description: Hours delayed from expected delivery (negative if early)

performance_grade.description: Performance grade (A, B, C, D, F) based on timeline adherence
